bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine settings
bullets.description: Standard machine type with 1 virtual CPU and 1 GB of memory.

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
1. This template requires user to provide either the password or SSH keys that was set while creating the image.
  2. If you provide only password, then template uses this password to login into the VM and set a new generated SSH key. The new generated SSH key is displayed in the Output page.
  3. If you wish to set your own SSH key, then input the password set in the VM image and also SSH key you wish to set to the VM.
  4. A typical deployment takes < 10 minutes.
